please_text: Fadlan gali nambarkaaga qaaska ah iyo furahaaga sirta ah halkan hoos si aad u ogaato xaalada kiiskaaga.
first_paragraph: Halkani waa cinwaanka RSC da looyaqano My Case kaasoo kaa caawin doona ogaasha akhbaarta kiiskaaga dib u dajinta dalka mareykanka. Isticmaal ciwanka lagu galo ee ku yaala dhinaca bidaxda si ad u gasho una hesho shaqsiiyan akhbaarta kiiskaaga.
second_paragraph: Waxay aheyd inuu ku siiyo furaha sirta ah shagaalihi RSC da ee kula yeeshay wareysiga koowaad. Hadii aad hilmaantay furahaaga sirta ah ama aad rabto inaad badasho furahaaga sirta ah, fadlan ku dhufo ama guji “CODSO FURA BADALID” ee ku yaala gacanta bidixda waxana racda tilmamida kusobxeyso.
third_paragraph: Hadii aad sual kusaabsan kiiskaaga qabto ama RSC da ama barnaamijka ogolaasha qaxootiga dalka mareykanka waxad qoraal kula soo xiriri kartaa Case@CWSAfrica.org. RSC aya kaga sojawabeso sualahaga mudo 14 biri gudahoda.
fourth_paragraph: USRAP waa wa lacag la’aan. Nasoo wargali qofkii lacag ku waydiiyo ama aad ugashakisid musuq maasuq cinwankaan Fraud@CWSAfrica.org
